RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the 2008 Chevrolet truck driven by Feder: 2008 Chevrolet truck driven by Federico Saldana
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Ch: flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Chevrolet truck

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.scissor lift: Scissor lift with new paint job and corrugated metal plates under the tires, transported on the flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Chevrolet truck
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.2008 Chevrolet truck driven by Federico: Vehicle searched by Williamson County Sheriff's Office after obtaining consent from Federico Saldana, with suspected cargo including narcotics and dope, outfitted with over-sized tires and after-market rims
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Chevro: Trailer searched by Williamson County Sheriff's Office after obtaining consent from Federico Saldana, transporting a scissor lift with new paint job and corrugated metal plates under the tires
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: Veteran narcotics investigator with Williamson County Sheriff's Office, testified about atypical features of the 2008 Chevrolet truck and flatbed trailer, including oversized tires and after-market rims often used to hide loads of narcotics
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Williamson County Sheriff's Office: Law enforcement agency conducting the search, requesting consent from Federico Saldana
